column4: was wondering if anyone could help me out.. Ive installed no-ip in terminal threw ssh term and i need to change the host for it so im wondering whats the command to update no-ip?
: try in a terminal : sudo dpkg-reconfigure no-ip
Shutting down dynamic address update: no-ip.
i tried the command georgy_28 told me but no luck on my dns connecting is there anything else i should do anyone/
ive changed my no-ip host and im wondering how to make ubuntu server update to see the new host can anyone help out?
ive been looking all ic is how to install it
sudo no-ip -c then restart with sudo no-ip
ive changed my no-ip host and im wondering how to make ubuntu server update to see the new host can anyone help out?
i did that but it only said this
Shutting down dynamic address update: no-ip.
